Company DescriptionOur goal is to advance healthcare through data science. Our passion is providing high-impact, user-friendly technologies, and analytics. We are motivated by results. Our specialized healthcare intelligence solutions are essential to finding practical knowledge that advances patient outcomes, motivates physician productivity, and enables success with value-based payment models. We provide clinically sophisticated solutions that result in outcomes that have a real impact on real people.Job DescriptionThe ArborMetrix Director of Business Intelligence will work with one of our premier clients to ensure a successful, long-term business relationship, centered around ArborMetrix’s healthcare performance-measurement and analytic web applications. This person will drive thought leadership and visioning of what can be achieved leveraging the ArborMetrix data analytics platform. They will engage at the highest levels of the client organization to lead innovation and solutioning and will then drive execution within ArborMetrix and the Dedicated Service Team.Manage client relationship including overall satisfaction, direction, and expectations through strategic account planning, and proactive relationship management. Develop rapport as a partner to key client senior leadership. Establish a thorough understanding of customer’s challenges, goals, and trends. Provide thought leadership for client analytics solutioning. Brainstorm and drive visioning to deliver solutions that meet and exceed customer expectations. Drive scoping and team execution of client analytics solutions with a focus on timeliness and quality. Directly manage Dedicated Service team resources. Engage with client to determine team’s workstreams and priorities.
QualificationsBachelors/Masters in analytic field or comparable years relevant professional experience4+ years’ experience in Analytics role with experience in Healthcare2+ years leading team (directly or indirectly) deep understanding of data trends and healthcareTableau experienceExperience formulating / implementing innovative solutions to solve business needs. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and juggle multiple projects; strong prioritization skills to meet deadlines. Confident and calm presence; ability to lead client discussions and drive progress; able to direct team members. Strong communication and writing skills. Comfortable working in a remote, distributed and highly collaborative companyCandidate within a US CST/EST time zone ONLYAdditional InformationArborMetrix is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate in its selection and employment practices on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, disability, genetic information, age, membership in an employee organization, or other non-merit factors.All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
